issue.title: [R] Update as.Date() to support direct casting from double/float
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15807](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15807). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This might need support from C++ as, at present, it is not possible to cast directly from a double. Currently, we are flooring the double to an integer as an intermediate step.
